context_left: Today’s threat landscape is characterized by attackers preying on human vulnerability.
context_right: research shows that [nearly 99% of all threats](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/resources/threat-reports/human-factor) require some sort of human interaction. Whether it is malware-free threats such as the different types of Business Email Compromise ([BEC](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/threat-reference/business-email-compromise)) or Email Account Compromise ([EAC](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/corporate-blog/post/what-email-account-compromise-eac)) like [payroll diversion](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/understanding-bec-scams-payroll-diversion), [account takeover](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/combatting-bec-and-eac-how-cloud-app-security-can-protect-your-company), and executive impersonation, or malware-based threats like the Ryuk Ransomware that is carried by [Bazaloader](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/threat-protection/providing-healthcare-organizations-visibility-latest-ransomware-attacks), people are falling victim to these attacks day-in and day-out.
_context_right: research shows that [nearly 99% of all threats](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/resources/threat-reports/human-factor) require some sort of human interaction.
sentence_left: Today’s threat landscape is characterized by attackers preying on human vulnerability.
sentence_right: Whether it is malware-free threats such as the different types of Business Email Compromise ([BEC](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/threat-reference/business-email-compromise)) or Email Account Compromise ([EAC](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/corporate-blog/post/what-email-account-compromise-eac)) like [payroll diversion](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/understanding-bec-scams-payroll-diversion), [account takeover](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/combatting-bec-and-eac-how-cloud-app-security-can-protect-your-company), and executive impersonation, or malware-based threats like the Ryuk Ransomware that is carried by [Bazaloader](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/threat-protection/providing-healthcare-organizations-visibility-latest-ransomware-attacks), people are falling victim to these attacks day-in and day-out.
label: Proofpoint is an enterprise security company based in Sunnyvale, California that provides software as a service and products for inbound email security, outbound data loss prevention, social media, mobile devices, digital risk, email encryption, electronic discovery ("eDiscovery”), and email archiving. It claims over half of the Fortune 100 as users of its solutions.

context_left: ### **Applying NexusAI to Stop Threats** [
context_right: NexusAI](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/technology-platform) employs many techniques to detect numerous targeted threats such as BEC, EAC, phishing, cloud attacks, multi-stage attacks, and others. As an example, [BEC supplier invoicing fraud](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/understanding-bec-scams-supplier-invoicing-fraud) attacks are sophisticated and complex schemes to steal money by either presenting a fraudulent invoice as legitimate or by re-routing the payment to a bank account controlled by the attacker.

mention: It is extremely hard for traditional systems to detect due to two factors: they are very targeted and contain no payload.
context_left: As an example, [BEC supplier invoicing fraud](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/understanding-bec-scams-supplier-invoicing-fraud) attacks are sophisticated and complex schemes to steal money by either presenting a fraudulent invoice as legitimate or by re-routing the payment to a bank account controlled by the attacker.
context_right: We are successful at stopping these threats with NexusAI for BEC Detection which uses ML to dynamically analyze a wide range of message attributes, including header information, domain, and message body to determine if a message is an impostor message.

mention: ### **Leveraging Machine Learning for a People-Centric Problem**
context_left: Whether it is malware-free threats such as the different types of Business Email Compromise ([BEC](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/threat-reference/business-email-compromise)) or Email Account Compromise ([EAC](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/corporate-blog/post/what-email-account-compromise-eac)) like [payroll diversion](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/understanding-bec-scams-payroll-diversion), [account takeover](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/cybersecurity-essentials/combatting-bec-and-eac-how-cloud-app-security-can-protect-your-company), and executive impersonation, or malware-based threats like the Ryuk Ransomware that is carried by [Bazaloader](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/blog/threat-protection/providing-healthcare-organizations-visibility-latest-ransomware-attacks), people are falling victim to these attacks day-in and day-out.
context_right: To stop these types of attacks, organizations need to deploy a solution that can stay ahead of the ever-changing landscape and adapt to the way humans act.
